title: Get info about a Spark Ad post

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: The content type of the request. Allowed value: "application/json" .

parameters.name: auth_code
parameters.description: The authorization code for the Spark Ads post.

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: The return message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: The return code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

fields.name: auth_info
fields.description: Information about the authorization.

fields.name: auth_end_time
fields.description: The time when the authorization code expires (UTC+0), in the format of 2017-01-01 00:00:00.

fields.name: auth_start_time
fields.description: The time when the authorization code becomes valid (UTC+0), in the format of 2017-01-01 00:00:00.

fields.name: item_info
fields.description: Information about the Spark Ads post.

fields.name: auth_code
fields.description: The authorization code for the Spark Ads post.

fields.name: item_id
fields.description: The ID of the Spark Ads post.

fields.name: item_type
fields.description: The type of Spark Ads post. Enum values: VIDEO : video post. CAROUSEL : photo post.

fields.name: text
fields.description: The description of the Spark Ads post.

fields.name: status
fields.description: The status of the Spark Ads post. For enum values, see Enumerations-TikTok Post Item Status .

fields.name: carousel_info
fields.description: Information about the photo post. Note : When item_type is VIDEO , the value of this field will be null.

fields.name: image_info
fields.description: Information about the images used in the photo post. The images are returned in the same order as they are shown in the photo post.

fields.name: image_url
fields.description: The URL of the image. Validity period: 90 days.

fields.name: image_height
fields.description: The height of the image, measured in pixels.

fields.name: image_width
fields.description: The width of the image, measured in pixels.

fields.name: music_info
fields.description: Information about the music used in the photo post. Note : If the photo post is directly published in the TikTok App without music, the value of this field will be null.

fields.name: music_url
fields.description: The URL of the music. Validity period: 90 days.

fields.name: music_duration
fields.description: The duration of the music, in seconds.

fields.name: stitch_original_item_id
fields.description: If the post is a stitch from another post, the item ID of the original post.

fields.name: duet_original_item_id
fields.description: If the post is a duet from another post, the item ID of the original post.

fields.name: is_multi_duet_stitch
fields.description: Whether this is a duet or stitch post that is created based on another duet or stitch post.

fields.name: mentioned_item_ids
fields.description: If the post mentions another video, the item IDs of the original posts. Note: The post can only mention at most one video.

fields.name: anchor_list
fields.description: Information about anchors in the post (video).

fields.name: id
fields.description: Anchor ID.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Anchor title.

fields.name: status
fields.description: Anchor status. Enum values: CHECK_ING (anchor review in progress), CHECK_FAILED (anchor review failed), CHECK_SUCCESS (anchor review successful).

fields.name: product_regions
fields.description: Regions where the ad can be deployed.

fields.name: url
fields.description: Item URL.

fields.name: spu_id
fields.description: Returned only when the post contains a product anchor link The SPU ID of the product that the post is associated with.

fields.name: spu_name
fields.description: Returned only when the post contains a product anchor link The name of the product that the post is associated with.

fields.name: store_id
fields.description: Returned only when the post contains a product anchor link The ID of the TikTok Shop that the product belongs to.

fields.name: user_info
fields.description: Information about the TikTok account.

fields.name: tiktok_name
fields.description: The user name of the TikTok account.

fields.name: identity_id
fields.description: Identity ID.

fields.name: identity_type
fields.description: Identity Type.

fields.name: video_info
fields.description: Information about the video post. Note : When item_type is CAROUSEL , the values for the parameters within the video_info object will be null.

fields.name: bit_rate
fields.description: Video bit rate, in bps.

fields.name: duration
fields.description: The duration of the video, in seconds.

fields.name: size
fields.description: The size of the video, in bytes.

fields.name: width
fields.description: The width of the video.

fields.name: height
fields.description: The height of the video.

fields.name: video_id
fields.description: Video ID.

fields.name: file_name
fields.description: Video name.

fields.name: poster_url
fields.description: The URL to the video poster. It is valid for an hour. When it expires, you need to call the endpoint again to get a new URL.

fields.name: preview_url
fields.description: The preview URL for the video. It is valid for an hour. When it expires, you need to call the endpoint again to get a new URL.

fields.name: signature
fields.description: MD5 for the video.

fields.name: request_id
fields.description: The unique log ID for the request.
